title: Kryptowerk
author: Kryptowerk
created_time: June 05, 2022, 02:20:31 PMLast edit: June 05, 2022, 03:01:55 PM by Kryptowerk
content: Up for auction are *four* lots:1: 4x brass finish 1k 2019 Moonbits metal chips2: 2x silver finish 1k 2019 Moonbits metal chips3: 1x titan finish 5k 2019 Moonbits metal chip4: 1x grey 1k PRE-RELEASE Moonbits 2018 plastic poker chipAll chips are original Moonbits Bitcoin chips. All coins/chips are factory-funded and come with the intact hologram attached.For more info on Moonbits chips, please see: Moonbits Reference ThreadClick for high resolution. Click for high resolution.Note: The plastic 2018 chip with Moonbits hologram was never released officially - probably only a low 2-digit number in existence.If you are a new account without any positive trading trust please send me a pm and pay 0.003 BTC collateral (to me or a trusted escrow) to verify your legimate intent of bidding in this auction. Funds will be returned after successful auction end and payment.Starting prices:Lot 1: 4x brass MB 0.004Lot 2: 2x silver MB 0.002Lot 3: 1x titan MB   0.005Lot 4: 1x grey MB   0.001Minimum bid increase: 0.0005SPECIAL:- Highest bid (of the 4 lots) gets the wooden engraved BTX chip for freeAUCTION ENDS: Tuesday 2022-06-14, 6 pm EST (24:00 Berlin time)Shipping: Additional to the winning bid. Ships from EU. Buyer responsible for any local customs/duties.Ranges from 10 / 15 €: EU / outside EU. Including tracking.Sniping: Each bid in the final 15 minutes adds 15 minutes until no bid has been made for 15 minutes (for all lots).Payment accepted in: BTC, LTC, ETH or XMRExcluded from bidding: If you are a new account, or have issues in your trust feedback, please PM prior to bidding. Copper membership is the way to go as a new member. I will exclude in extreme cases, but I reserve the right to exclude/disqualify bidders at my sole discretion.  Forum downtime: If the forum goes offline in the final 4 hours of the auction I may extend the auction at my discretion.Payment required within 48 hours after auction end.Payment address will be supplied to the winner via PM (only here via bitcointalk!).  Make sure you are communicating with me and not an imposter account before sending funds or sensible information!Feel free to ask questions via PM - or in this thread if directly related to the auctioned items.
